guide.title: Gentoo Linux ScreenShots!
guide.abstract: Screenshots of Gentoo Linux in action. Whee!

chapter.title: Here they are... click for larger PNG versions!

body.p: Mikael Hallendal (Hallski) is a GNOME developer and Gentoo Linux Desktop Team Leader. Here's his nice 1600x1200 GNOME desktop:
Daniel Robbins (me!) is the Chief Architect of Gentoo Linux. Here's my 1280x1024 desktop:
Dan Armak is in charge of all things KDE for Gentoo Linux. Here's a snapshot of his KDE-3.0_beta1 desktop, along with Hebrew support:
Grant Goodyear (aka g2boojum) is a Gentoo Linux developer and a help to many in need. Here's a snapshot of Grant's busy KDE 2.2.2 desktop:

Bart Verwilst is one of our desktop developers. He assists Dan Armak as well as doing a bunch of other miscellaneous things. In this screenshot, you can see his KDE desktop which is using mosfet's liquid widgets theme:

Geert Bevin is the Gentoo Linux Portage Release Engineer and also helps out in a lot of other areas. Here's a shot of his 1600x1200 desktop, running sawfish with the sawfish-merlin extensions which provide the pager and the iconbox:
